## NodeNames type

A utility type for retrieving the name of an extension only when it's a node extension.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare type NodeNames<GExtension extends AnyExtension> = GExtension extends NodeExtension<any> ? GExtension['name'] : never;
```
